scripts.//: purpusefully don't provide a tsconfig to prevent resolution to root tsconfig causing a breaking build
scripts.build: npx esbuild main.ts --tsconfig=  --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=output/main.js && npx esbuild post.ts --tsconfig=  --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=output/post.js
